post_text: As we near the end of the 2019-2020 school year MECHS would like to celebrate our students with the Bragging Wagon! We will be providing a drive-thru meal at the site on Tuesday, June 2 at 6:00 pm. Students and families, please remain in your vehicle at all times as you drive by and pick up this celebratory meal. In your bag, you will receive a hotdog, little Debbie snack, condiments, and a water bottle.

shared_text:
Mountain Education Charter High School
April 17 at 1:38 PM ·

MECHS is working diligently to provide the safest option for a commencement ceremony for the spring of 2020. Graduation was originally scheduled for May 30th; however, due to the current situation with COVID-19 graduation will either be postponed until later this summer or we will host a virtual ceremony. With that being said, Dr. Lovell and everyone at MECHS would prefer to host traditional graduation with virtual being the absolute last resort. We are working with the University of North Georgia for potential new dates and times. Once we have more guidance from Governor Kemp and the Department of Education, we will communicate that to all of you. Please be assured that graduation will be happening whether at a later date or virtually.

post_text:
Here is an updated food resource list. Thank you to these amazing community partners.

**Community Economic Relief Fund: 1-866-211-9966 . Help with food, rent and bills.
**Hope Center: Call Ms. Bona at 706-498-4908. Hope Center will deliver a box of food to the address given.
**Franklin County Food Bank: Located at the Lavonia Community Center, 39 Poole St. Lavonia Open 1st Tuesday of the month
Contact Person Mitch Murphy 706-491-0305
Royston Rainbow Pantry: 706-245-0965 . 191 Campbell Street, Royston, GA
**Stephens County School System for those 18 and under:
706-886-9415 . Ext 1642
**New Hope Baptist Church--6731 Mize Road, Toccoa .
9-10 AM Saturday April 11. First come first serve.
Second Saturday each month.

**Hope Center of Toccoa-- 69 Whitman St. Toccoa GA
Breakfast & Lunch Every Monday, Wednesday & Saturday 9 am-12
Have facilities for laundry, showers, and a substantial clothes closet.
Emergency Food Pantry.

Rainbow Pantry of Royston . 191 Campbell Street, Royston, GA
Open 11-2 pm 2nd and 4th Tuesday of the month
April 7th & 21st
May 12th&26th
June 9th-23rd

Mountain Education Charter High School
March 30 at 5:17 PM ·

If you find yourself feeling isolated, worried about your family, concerned about being alone at home with children for days or weeks, or in need of essential resources like food or funds for utilities and rent, please call 1-800-CHILDREN (244-5373). MECHS counselors are also available to families and students during this time. Let’s navigate this new normal together.

post_text: All Mountain Education Charter High School locations will remain closed until further notice due to the impact of COVID-19 in our communities. Because national and state information about the coronavirus changes daily, we are unable to make decisions about when school will resume. Online learning will continue Monday through Thursday from 4-9 pm.
text: All Mountain Education Charter High School locations will remain closed until further notice due to the impact of COVID-19 in our communities. Because national and state information about the coronavirus changes daily, we are unable to make decisions about when school will resume. Online learning will continue Monday through Thursday from 4-9 pm.

Shyann Lewis- selected by the Math Department for her great attendance, work ethic. She completed 10+ modules in Algebra I this month. She also displays a great attitude with her peers and teachers.

Skylar Brown- selected by the Math Department for her good work ethic, attendance, and attitude.

Matthew Shirley- selected by Student Services for his outstanding attendance, excellent behavior and attitude, and completion of World History. He also a candidate for Dual Enrollment.

post_text:
The Stephens site of Mountain Education Charter High School was awarded four year-end awards this year:

Mountain Recovery Team- SMEC met its 10% increase in attendance over last year.

Summiteer Award- SMEC had 10% growth in EOC scores as compared to the previous three years.

SMEC had the highest percentage of students who are dual enrolled.

SMEC also won the Richard Behrens Achievement Award for having the highest percentage of students who scored at the proficient and distinguished levels.

Congratulations to the SMEC students and staff!

Summiteer Award- SMEC had 10% growth in EOC scores as compared to the previous three years.

SMEC had the highest percentage of students who are dual enrolled.

SMEC also won the Richard Behrens Achievement Award for having the highest percentage of students who scored at the proficient and distinguished levels.

Congratulations to the SMEC students and staff!

post_text:
It's that time of year! Come celebrate the MECHS Class of 2019 at our first annual combined graduation. All 16 of our sites will graduate together this year.

We look forward to seeing everyone on Saturday, May 25 at 1:00 at the University of North Georgia Convocation Center in Dahlonega, Georgia.

A reception will follow.

If you need transportation, please contact Lea Mitchell at 706-886-3114. A bus will be leaving the Stephens site at 7:30 am.

If you cannot make it, please make sure to tune in on Facebook Live to watch the event.

A reception will follow.

If you need transportation, please contact Lea Mitchell at 706-886-3114. A bus will be leaving the Stephens site at 7:30 am.

post_text:
FTE Fun:

Thursday – Feb 8th – Apply to College @ 4:30. All students will attend for the first 30 minutes then Seniors will be able to apply. Gas vouchers!

Monday – Feb 12th – Double Dip Night – Guest Speaker @ 5:30 Dairy Queen Blizzards!

Wednesday – Feb 14th – Movie Night “Wonder” Popcorn, snow cones, and cotton candy will be served!.

Wednesday – Feb 21st – Pizza supper

Thursday – Feb 22nd – Guest Speaker – Terry Shugart McDonalds Supper

Monday- Feb 26th - Bingo Night and Guest Speaker – Pro Football Hall of Famer Billy Shaw
